name: Afterlife Connections LLC
description:
Afterlife Connections LLC was designed to challenge everyone in the Sleeping Titan team to do their absolute best with whatever we had, whether it be for our artists Grimsock and Zerandi, our writers WorriedWyvern and Revdioc, or our lead programmer (and MVP,)  Xhalth. We're proud to have accomplished so much in only 100 hours! 

  • GitLab Project Link: https://gitlab.com/SleepingTitanCore/ecjam4
